## Documentation Issue

Describe the issue with the documentation:

- [ ] Incorrect information
- [ ] Unclear or confusing explanation
- [ ] Missing information
- [ ] Outdated content
- [ ] Broken links
- [ ] Spelling or grammar errors
- [ ] Other

## Location

Which documentation page has the issue?

- [ ] README.md
- [ ] Getting Started Guide
- [ ] Usage Guide
- [ ] API Reference
- [ ] FAQ
- [ ] Examples
- [ ] Architecture Docs
- [ ] Other: _________
